title: VariSAC: V2X Assured Connectivity in RIS-Aided ISAC via GNN-Augmented Reinforcement Learning
summary: This paper explores dynamic spatial resource management and real-time adaptation in vehicular networks using Reconfigurable Intelligent Surfaces (RIS) and Integrated Sensing and Communication (ISAC), addressing challenges in V2I and V2V connectivity with highly dynamic and heterogeneous network topologies.
usefulness_reason: The paper discusses "dynamic spatial resource management" and "real-time adaptation to environmental changes" in vehicular networks, which clearly involves spatio-temporal aspects.
